About

A local multiplayer spaceship driving game where both playerâ€™s controls are periodically randomized. Practically impossible to play, let alone beat. The core idea came from the thought of having to play finger twister with someone on a single keyboard. Made for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam.

What I Learned

This project saw me implementing features to a design and specification that was largely external rather than a design process I wa directly involved in. Good practice.
